search.query: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv NOT source=*pcap2csv.sh NOT source=*pcap2csv.bat| rex field=source "SplunkForPCAP(\\\\|\/)PCAPcsv(\\\\|\/)(?<source>.*)" |stats count by source
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | stats count
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ info=*retran* NOT "retransmission?" $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | stats count

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$| stats count as total, count(eval(searchmatch("*TCP*retran*"))) as packetslost| eval percent_difference=((packetslost/total)*100) | table percent_difference

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ protocol=TCP | transaction maxspan=5s tcp_stream startswith="[SYN]" endswith="[ACK]" | search linecount=3 AND "SYN, ACK"| stats count

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ |eval Conversation=src_ip+"->"+dst_ip+":"+dst_port | transaction maxspan=5s maxevents=5 tcp_stream startswith="[SYN]" endswith="*retran*" | search linecount>1 | stats count

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | eval searchErrors=case(searchmatch("*retran*"), "Retransmissions",searchmatch("*zero*"), "Zero Window", searchmatch("*update*"), "Window Update") | stats max(relative_time) as "duration of tcp-stream" count as "#packets" count(searchErrors) as "#errors" by tcp_stream, src_ip, dst_ip | sort - "#packets" | rename src_ip as "source-ip" dst_ip as "destination-ip"
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | eval conversation=src_ip+"->"+dst_ip |timechart span=$Span$ sum(tcp_length) as "Sum TCP Length" by conversation
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | timechart span=$Span$ sum(tcp_length) as "Sum TCP Length" by protocol

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | rex "^[^\[\n]*\[(?P<flags>[^\]]+)"| search flags=*FIN* OR flags=*PSH* OR flags=*SYN* OR flags=*ACK* OR flags=*RST* NOT flags=*DUP* NOT flags=*keep* NOT flags=*packet* NOT flags=*segment*| timechart span=$Span$ count by flags usenull=f
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | timechart span=$Span$ count by protocol usenull=f

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ (info=*retran* OR info=*zero* OR info=*Port*re*used* OR info=*window* OR info=*update*) NOT info=*continuation* NOT info="*#*" NOT "retransmission?" NOT info="*\Windows\*" NOT info="*Dynamic update*" | rex "^[^\[\n]*\[(?P<tcp_error>[^\]]+)" | timechart span=$Span$ count by tcp_error usenull=f

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ (info=*retran* OR info=*zero* OR info=*Port*re*used* OR info=*window* OR info=*update*) NOT info=*continuation* NOT info="*#*" NOT "retransmission?" NOT info="*\Windows\*" NOT info="*Dynamic update*" | rex "^[^\[\n]*\[(?P<tcp_error>[^\]]+)" | stats count by tcp_error | sort - count

chart.title: TCP errors over time by SourceIP

search.query: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ (info=*retran* OR info=*zero* OR info=*Port*re*used* OR info=*window* OR info=*update*) NOT info=*continuation* NOT info="*#*" NOT "retransmission?" NOT info="*\Windows\*" NOT info="*Dynamic update*" | rex "^[^\[\n]*\[(?P<tcp_error>[^\]]+)" | timechart span=$Span$ count by src_ip

index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ (info=*retran* OR info=*zero* OR info=*Port*re*used* OR info=*window* OR info=*update*) NOT info=*continuation* NOT info="*#*" NOT "retransmission?" NOT info="*\Windows\*" NOT info="*Dynamic update*" | rex "^[^\[\n]*\[(?P<tcp_error>[^\]]+)" | search tcp_error=*retran*| eval Conversation=src_ip+" -> "+dst_ip | stats count by Conversation | sort -count
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ rtt=* | eval conversation=src_ip+"->"+dst_ip|timechart span=$Span$ max(rtt) as "Max RTT" $rtt$
index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv $Source$ $IP1$ AND $IP2$ AND $Port1$ AND $Port2$ | timechart span=$Span$ $action$(win_size) as "WinSize" by src_ip
